title: Coronavirus Antibody Tests Expected in the U.S. in Days, Says Fauci
description: WASHINGTON — The top U.S. infectious disease official says coronavirus antibody tests are just days away. Dr. Anthony Fauci says at the last White House coronavirus task force meeting, the people responsible for developing, validating and disseminating the te…
content:
